attributes.action: understand youth and offer support in relation to gun crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this is basicly a pettition to make aware the need to tackle the root of gun crime /and or drugs in our youth comunity ....poverty ,lack of jobs , poor housing and amenities....this is not what is directly causing the problem ...but most of the trouble stems from this ....
